aboutmeData.title: About Me
paragraphs: Currently a freelance full-stack developer specialized in ReactJS/NodeJS, I aspire to participate in innovative and stimulating projects to leverage my skills in designing increasingly rich and complex applications.
My great adaptability and my constant desire to progress make me a committed developer, ready to actively contribute to adventures that are as professionally enriching as they are humanly rewarding.
Feel free to reach out if you're seeking a motivated and dedicated professional, eager to actively contribute to your company and thrive in a stimulating environment.

educationData.place: Doranco Ecole Sup' Tech Creatives & OpenClassroom, Online Courses
educationData.info: Completed Courses in HTML, CSS, Javascript, MySQL, PHP, Symfony, React, React-Native, Git, Adobe XD, Figma.

educationData.type: DUT - Two-Year University Degree in Sciences

works: Web development in line with UX/UI principles.
Development of REST, GraphQL, and tRPC APIs.
Creation and management of databases.
Secure integration of online payment and subscription solutions.
Development of contextual AI chatbots.
Implementation of automated tests. Jest/RTL
Client communication, analysis, and interpretation of IT needs.
Writing of technical and functional specifications.
Design and prototyping of user interface.
Various open-source projects:
PDFAI: SaaS application enabling communication on PDF documents via AI chatbot.
Carbnb: CtoC platform for peer-to-peer car rental (Airbnb model).
Marrymix: BtoC E-commerce platform for festive event services.
Chesspy: Site for statistical analysis of chess.
Development of technical solutions compliant with client specifications.
Creation and management of databases.
Development of REST APIs.

Testing, customer feedback management, and improvement (Agile method).
Integration of Figma mockups adhering to UX/UI principles.

Digital monitoring to ensure data security and legal compliance.

Development of militant activity.
